statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -6 \\ 15 \\ 21 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 2 \\ 9 \\ 15 \\ -7 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
